title.narrative: Individual Commitment for payments of PEGASE component No. 2: contribution to Civil Servants and Pensioners (CSP) - 2018

description.narrative: The EU will contribute to the payment of salaries and pensions to the PA civil servants in the West Bank. title.narrative: Individual Commitment for payments of PEGASE component No. 4: contribution to East Jerusalem Hospitals (EJH) - 2018

description.narrative: The six EJH provide a quality range of tertiary healthcare, most of which is not available elsewhere in Palestine. The financial difficulties of the Palestinian Authority have resulted in a situation where numerous hospital bills underwritten by the Ministry of Health for referrals to the EJH remain unpaid generating arrears despite ongoing reforms. This activity aims to ensure access to quality health services to the entire Palestinian population by covering part of the arrears for referrals.

title.narrative: Strengthening the National Bank of Georgia capacity in the field of Banking and Payment Services in line with the EU Standards

description.narrative: The project will contribute to stability and transparency of the financial sector in Georgia by assisting the National Bank of Georgia (NBG) to improve overall financial supervisory mechanisms in line with the EU best practices. Specifically, NBG will be strengthened in the field of banking and payment services in line with the regulatory, supervisory and enforcement framework approximated with the EU legislation as required by the EU-Georgia Association Agreement.

description.narrative: La santé de la population des zones ciblées, notamment celle des groupes les plus vulnérables, est améliorée.OS1 Promouvoir le dialogue au niveau local entre la société civile, les élu.e.s et les autres acteurs publics et privés du secteur de la santé, pour une meilleure gouvernance du système de santé.OS 2 Renforcer la structuration et les capacités des Organisations de la Société Civile (OSC) des zones ciblées pour une intervention locale plus efficace axée sur la santé.

title.narrative: Individual commitment for payment of Component 4 East Jerusalem Hospitals (EJH) 2019

description.narrative: The six EJH provide a quality range of tertiary healthcare, most of which is not available elsewhere in Palestine. The financial difficulties of the Palestinian Authority have resulted in a situation where numerous hospital bills underwritten by the Ministry of Health for referrals to the EJH remain unpaid generating arrears despite ongoing reforms. This activity aims to ensure access to quality health services to the entire Palestinian population by covering part of the arrears for referrals.
